name: Let's Dango
description:
Let's make many Dangos!!

"Dango" is a Japanese snack made from rice flour.

[How to]
Roll dango dough by using left and right hand button by turns.
*You can start rolling it either left hand or right hand.
Once the dango becomes round, press the button in the center, then you roll the next one.
Make many dango! You have only 30 seconds!
